data.author: LinuxHippy

changelog.release_notes:
Easy to see digital time on WVU logo with black background.  2 letter day and date shown along with Bluetooth and battery status indicators.  Background does not invert colors on Bluetooth disconnect but rather just quickly vibrates to let you know of the status.

WVU students, fans, and alumni can show off their pride with this watchface!!
